name: Mere Christianity
reason: I've been wanting to read this book by C.S. Lewis! I heard it really details on the basics of the Gospel. I would like to read the physical copy as you see I'm building my personal library but I haven't been able to find the book anywhere.

name: Show Your Work
reason: I really love how Austin Kleon always goes straight to the point with his books! I've read Steal like an Artist and it affected the way I think, positively. I would love to read his sequel. I also just want to add the book to my collection.üòÅ

name: Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus
reason: The idea of Muslims converting to Christianity intrigues me because I think it's a big deal to leave a religion you've known all your life. I want to read this book to see the journey of Nabeel Qureshi and how God used him to reach others.

name: A Voice in the Wind
reason: Okay, okay, you see, I'm on a Francine Rivers reading spree lately! I just want to read all her books. I have bought and read four of them now. I want to also read this one and add it to my collection. I would also fancy any of her books really.ü•π Arigato

name: Pack of Stickers
reason: I want to spice up my commonplace book. To be honest, I just want to slap stickers on everything I own. I want cartoon characters, quotes, bible verses, cute animals, aesthetic stuff, you name it. I just want to decorate my stuff.

name: Any Fictional book
reason: I need book recommendations. I want to read more fictional books but I don't know which ones to read. I would like any book that you think I would like. I love christian, fantasy, romance, adventure, comedy and historical fiction. You name it. I also love poetry.

name: Notebooks
reason: I have the habit of keeping a commonplace book where I write down everything and anything. You could get me any notebook, but I would love a hardcover A5 one with lined pages.

name: Converse Shoes
reason: ü•πü•πBless your girl with new shoes. I like neutral colors like black, white, gray and I also fancy blue.

name: New Balance
reason: ü•πü•πBless your girl with new shoes. I heard these ones are super comfy

name: Black Low-Sole Loafers
reason: My current cooperate shoes are worn out and I need a new pair. I want a simple, classy pair that I can wear to school and formal events. I don't mind oxford shoes too.ü•π

name: Adidas Sambas
reason: ü•πü•π Should there really be an explanation. I just really like shoes. Bless your girl with new shoes.

name: Nike Dunks
reason: TYeesh, dunks are so cute. I would love a pair of these.ü•πü•π Black and white or blue and white anyone you think will look nice. I'm not that picky

name: Covered Boots
reason: I really like these boots. They look so stylish and would go with a lot of my outfits.ü•π

name: A Monitor
reason: Okay, okay. Here me out. I started using a monitor in my work place and it has been a life changer for real! I can have my code on one side and chrome or any other window on the other side. It makes working so much easier and faster.

name: Headsets
reason: My previous headset broke. They were really nicee. The sound quality and bass were so good. I would love a new pair. Pleasee

name: Earbuds
reason: This would be a nice have since it'll be easy to connect to both my phone, laptop and iPad. No one would even know I have them on.

name: Wireless Mics
reason: As you know, I'm building a visual podcast called IHAC, and I need good quality mics to record clear audios. This would be really great to have!

name: Photochromic Glasses
reason: I think I'm getting blinder by the day with all the screens I work with. A pair of these would be a lifesaver. My colleague now uses medicated glasses because he didn't save his eyes early. Help a tech sister out.

name: Tripod Stand
reason: This is also for my visual podcast IHAC. I really really need a tripod so I can record steady videos and I can place the stand anywhere I want to record. This would be super duper helpful. Help a sister.üò≠

name: Soundcore Neck Earpiece
reason: Okay, okay, these ones are also cool. I like that I don't need to put them away when I don't need to use them, I can just leave them on my ear. The one Nneoma gifted me, one of the ears are no longer working. I would love a new pair.

name: Portable Sewing Machine
reason: I want to get my sewing mojo back. I want to make my own clothes and also customize some of my old clothes. It will be really cool.

name: Polaroid Camera
reason: I want to capture memories and be able to add them to my journals especially as final year knocking on the door.

name: Mini Printer
reason: I want to print small photos and notes to keep memories and decorate my journals and commonplace book.

name: Pack of Crochet Yarn
reason: I crotchet a lot nowadays and I want to make more stuff. I would love a pack of colorful yarns to work with. The ones I get are the cheaper Nigerian made ones and they are great but they have it's limitations

name: Rubik's Cube
reason: I've been learning how to solve the rubik's cube and I don't have one to practice with. I would love to have one.

name: Messenger Bag
reason: Would love a sleek bag to carry my essentials, both for school and casual outings. They are giving korean aesthetic!

name: Aso Oke Pants
reason: I unfortunately don't have any casual traditional clothes and I would love to have at least some trousers I could style.

name: Jerseys
reason: I want to have jerseys! I don't care about the team or player, I just think they look cool. I would love a Steph Curry one thoughüåö.

name: Cute Sweaters
reason: Okay, sweaters always slap. Is there a limit to the amount of sweaters one can have? I don't think so. I would love a cute, cozy sweater to add to my collection.

name: Zipup Jacket
reason: It's trendy and fits my style perfectly for fall weather.

name: Analog Watch
reason: I really love analog watches. All the ones I have are spoilt now.

name: Jewelry
reason: Simple gold jewelry to add elegance and confidence to my style.

name: Beaded Jewelry
reason: Beaded jewelry gives me a unique, creative look and is perfect for casual wear.

name: Phone Charm
reason: Phone charms add a personal touch to my device and make it easier to find in my bag!

name: Biker Shades
reason: Stylish and practical, these shades are great for sunny days.

name: Bagonetta Glasses
reason: These glasses are stylish and perfect for completing my fall outfits.

name: Salicylic Acid
reason: For skincare to help me maintain a clear and healthy face.

name: Niacinamide
reason: This helps with my skin texture and acne marks. I've been wanting to include this in my routine for better skin health.

name: Olbolla Lipgloss
reason: This gloss is known for being super hydrating and aesthetic.
